secret = 21000000

privatekey = 21000000 * G = P

scriptPubKey_asm: <pubkey> OP_CHECKSIG

TERMINAL
--------------
>>> import coincurve
>>> hex(21000000)
'0x1406f40'
>>> privkey = bytes.fromhex('01406f40')
>>> g_point = coincurve.PrivateKey.from_int(1)
>>> g_point.public_key.format().hex()
'0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798'
>>> pubkey = g_point.multiply(privkey)
>>> pubkey.public_key.format().hex()
'02e79c4eb45764bd015542f6779cc70fef44b7a2432f839264768288efab886291'
---------------

TERMINAL
---------------
>>> digest = bytes.fromhex('010000000172cc91ffa2ccacebb635081b3fc707f5d48577f53fab42ae0607ae1363ddd2d400000000160014dce70742a7549d81152dada8873cb90782376d83feffffff010001010000000000160014fb247f8eaaddb3fd92d7e34bc4ccd45b513de36b00000000')
>>> msg = hashlib.sha256(hashlib.sha256(digest).digest()).digest()
>>> msg.hex()
'207e7c92d81d97d6a4c3a5658f4ee0ad98a9ed5479e8d52a759e4ff109e17117'
>>> privkey.sign(msg, hasher=None).hex()
'3045022100f7eafd021c3e8e467b3ba51532915e96ad1b94c359f8f6f5e2b8d7e1bd9a5c9d022076b46f0ea8afff960875c1575df2fb1e519af131b5f9b8cb89f9b1edc08681b6'
>>>
